# INSendMessageAttachment

**Class**

A file to include in a message.

## Declaration

```swift
class INSendMessageAttachment
```

## Overview

When the type of a message is [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INOutgoingMessageType/outgoingMessageAudio], the intent includes the audio recording as an [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INSendMessageAttachment].

## Creating an Audio Attachment

- **init(audioMessageFile:)**: Creates a message attachment with an audio file.

## Accessing the Message File

- **audioMessageFile**: The attachment’s recorded message.

## Sending a Message

- **INSendMessageIntentHandling**: An interface to handle sending messages to one or more designated users.
- **INSendMessageIntent**: A request to send a message to the designated recipients.
- **INSendMessageIntentResponse**: Your app’s response to a send message intent.
- **INOutgoingMessageType**: The format of the message.
- **INSendMessageIntentDonationMetadata**

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
